snippet.title: Zombusters Preview trailer
snippet.description:
Zombusters is a fun and action-packed 3rd person game that will let you sticked on your seat until the end. Its 2D graphics and isometric view make it a different specie in its genre. You will have to face a horde of Zombies that try to get you down with the help of various weapons/power ups and differents moving styles.

Zombusters will feature 4 player co-op on Xbox Live.

Release Date: Fall 2020


You can wishlist the game here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1272300/Zombusters/







For more info you can visit:

http://www.retrowax.com
http://www.zombusters.com

Or follow us on twitter and Facebook:

@retrowaxgames http://twitter.com/retrowaxgames

https://www.facebook.com/retrowaxgames/
https://twitter.com/retrowaxgames


Song "High Ground" performed by London To Tokio. Is a song featured in the Zombusters OST.
